title: Token Optimization
description: Reduce costs and improve response times through intelligent token management. Learn prompt compression, response control, and model selection strategies.

title: Caching Strategies
description: Cache intelligently to dramatically reduce latency and costs. Master tool result caching, conversation summarization, and semantic caching.

title: Scaling Patterns
description: Build agents that handle production load. Learn horizontal scaling, queue processing, rate limiting, and graceful degradation.

title: Context Management
description: Keep conversations efficient by managing context windows. Learn pruning strategies, summarization, and selective context loading.

title: Parallel Execution
description: Speed up agent workflows by executing independent operations concurrently. Learn dependency analysis and parallel patterns.
